newsitem.title: LEBANON: SOLIDERE shares mixed on Beirut Stock Exchange.
newsitem.headline: SOLIDERE shares mixed on Beirut Stock Exchange.

text.p: SOLIDERE shares were mixed on Thursday on higher turnover.
A shares held steady at $114 and B shares dropped slightly to $117.875 from $118 on Wednesday.
Turnover rose to 11,260 shares from 6,823 shares and value was $1,291,466 from $785,613.875.
There was a block trade in 108,235 shares of Ciments Libanais at $1.27, unchanged from October 10 when a block of 59,162 shares was traded.
There was no trade in the three other listed companies: Ciments Blancs, Eternit and Uniceramic, none of which were traded in the last two weeks.
The LISPI stock index fell 0.02 percent to 84.60 and the BLOM stock index fell 0.05 percent to 985.27.
